column1: #Text=" Azula says : " I would be honored if you would join me on my mission .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Oh ... I ... uh ... would love to .
#Text=But the truth is , I 'm really happy here .
#Text=I mean , my aura has never been pinker !
#Text=" Azula says : " I 'll take your word for it .
#Text=Well , I would n't want you to give up the life you love just to please me .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Thank you , Azula .
#Text=" Azula says : " Of course , before I leave , I 'm going to catch your show .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Uh ... yeah ... sure ... uh ... of course ... "
